item.title: Spark Summit 2021
item.description: Project Zen: Making Data Science Easier in PySpark Project Zen Goals: make spark more pythonic better ops with python libraries Changes: Python Hints better documentation support conda, pip, pipex to deploy package Shipping pacakge in conda pandas Api on Spark visualization Links: Project Zen Databricks Blog

item.title: Spark Simple Analysis
item.description:
During my Metis bootcamp, I did an intro presentation to my class about spark.

The presentation explored the content and length of a sample of the commit messages on github.

item.title: Setting up pyspark with jupyter
